page.title: 02Survey of Parents in Codsall
page.content: We surveyed the parents of children at Codsall Middle School, asking them to complete a questionnaire. These are the main results given as an impression rather than a detailed statistical record. Most parents were born in the West Midlands but not in Codsall. The main birthplace being Wolverhampton. Codsall's development as a dormitory settlement is evidenced by the length of habitation. Very few parents have lived here all their lives. Most put down 10-20 years, reflecting the ages of our intake. Codsall is well provided with shops,though several requests for Sunday opening reflect a current debate. Leisure facilities are thought satisfactory. Requests for squash court and more provisios for youngsters in the 13 to 18 age range were made.
